QuestData.Title: Sanctum Upgrade: The Ember Court
QuestData.Description:
We got a Scroll of Dark Empowerment ready for youz that should provide you with enough resources to get one of 'em fancy parties the fangs are fond of.
The Mad Duke is the one you should chat with 'bout this one. He used to run all the court parties back before he got roasted.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scroll of Dark Empowerment to begin the Ember Court.
QuestData.RewardText:
Come, come, my friend!
It is time... for a PARTY!
